Text:
Many thanks!
Only one problem: track 12 - 2:1 is missing (probably because of ":" in file name?)

kris_jag, thanks for the feedback.

Track 12 does exist in this torrent, as you can verify by clicking the "50" right after "Files:" at the top of this page, but your torrent client might not be showing it, or it might not be saving it correctly.  For now, try to find a way to change your local file names from within your torrent client, or try a torrent client that will let you do that (or one that will replace/strip characters that your OS doesn't support).

In the future, I'll be more mindful of special characters.  Sorry for the inconvenience.

Thanks, for Your response :)
Yes, it was fault of my torrent client - track 2:1 has been actually downloaded, but with some strange file name and I missed it. I changed extension to flac and now everything is OK.
Thank you again for share!!!
